metadata.title: CVE-2023-31622 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the sqlc_make_policy_trig component of openlinkvirtuoso-opensource v7.2.9 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service(DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
